Translations.Text: ikterabe linnasi hisabuhum vehum fi gafletim mu`ridun
ma ye'tihim min zikrim mir rabbihim muhdesin ille-steme`uhu vehum yel`abun
lahiyeten kulubuhum. veeserru-nnecva. ellezine zalemu. hel haza illa beser mislukum. efete'tune-ssihra veentum tubsirun
kale rabbi ya`lemu-lkavle fi-ssemai vel'ard. vehuve-ssemi`u-l`alim
bel kalu adgasu ahlamim beli-fterahu bel huve sa`ir. felye'tina biayetin kema ursile-l'evvelun
ma amenet kablehum min karyetin ehleknaha. efehum yu'minun
vema erselna kableke illa ricalen nuhi ileyhim fes'elu ehle-zzikri in kuntum la ta`lemun
vema ce`alnahum cesedel la ye'kulune-tta`ame vema kanu halidin
summe sadaknahumu-lva`de feenceynahum vemen nesau veehlekne-lmusrifin
lekad enzelna ileykum kitaben fihi zikrukum. efela ta`kilun
vekem kasamna min karyetin kanet zalimetev veense'na ba`deha kavmen aharin
felemma ehassu be'sena iza hum minha yerkudun
la terkudu verci`u ila ma utriftum fihi vemesakinikum le`allekum tus'elun
kalu ya veylena inna kunna zalimin
fema zalet tilke da`vahum hatta ce`alnahum hasiden hamidin
vema halakne-ssemae vel'arda vema beynehuma la`ibin
lev eradna en nettehize lehvel lettehaznahu mil ledunna. in kunna fa`ilin
bel nakzifu bilhakki `ale-lbatili feyedmeguhu feiza huve zahik. velekumu-lveylu mimma tesifun
velehu men fi-ssemavati vel'ard. vemen `indehu la yestekbirune `an `ibadetihi vela yestahsirun
yusebbihune-lleyle vennehara la yefturun
emi-ttehazu alihetem mine-l'ardi hum yunsirun
lev kane fihima alihetun ille-llahu lefesedeta. fesubhane-llahi rabbi-l`arsi `amma yesifun
la yus'elu `amma yef`alu vehum yus'elun
emi-ttehazu min dunihi aliheh. kul hatu burhanekum. haza zikru mem me`iye vezikru men kabli. bel ekseruhum la ya`lemune-lhakka fehum mu`ridun
vema erselna min kablike mir rasulin illa nuhi ileyhi ennehu la ilahe illa ene fa`budun
vekalu-ttehaze-rrahmanu veleden subhaneh. bel `ibadum mukramun
la yesbikunehu bilkavli vehum biemrihi ya`melun
ya`lemu ma beyne eydihim vema halfehum vela yesfe`une illa limeni-rteda vehum min hasyetihi musfikun
vemey yekul minhum inni ilahum min dunihi fezalike neczihi cehennem. kezalike neczi-zzalimin
evelem yera-llezine keferu enne-ssemavati vel'arda kaneta ratkan fefetaknahuma. vece`alna mine-lmai kulle sey'in hayy. efela yu'minun
vece`alna fi-l'ardi ravasiye en temide bihim vece`alna fiha ficacen subulel le`allehum yehtedun
vece`alne-ssemae sakfem mahfuza. vehum `an ayatiha mu`ridun
vehuve-llezi haleka-lleyle vennehara vessemse velkamer. kullun fi felekiy yesbehun
vema ce`alna libeserim min kablike-lhuld. efeim mitte fehumu-lhalidun
kullu nefsin zaikatu-lmevt. veneblukum bisserri velhayri fitneh. veileyna turce`un
veiza raake-llezine keferu iy yettehizuneke illa huzuva. ehaze-llezi yezkuru alihetekum. vehum bizikri-rrahmani hum kafirun
hulika-l'insanu min `acel. seurikum ayati fela testa`cilun
veyekulune meta haze-lva`du in kuntum sadikin
lev ya`lemu-llezine keferu hine la yekuffune `av vucuhihimu-nnara vela `an zuhurihim vela hum yunsarun
bel te'tihim bagteten fetebhetuhum fela yesteti`une raddeha vela hum yunzarun
velekadi-stuhzie birusulim min kablike fehaka billezine sehiru minhum ma kanu bihi yestehziun
kul mey yekleukum billeyli vennehari mine-rrahman. bel hum `an zikri rabbihim mu`ridun
em lehum alihetun temne`uhum min dunina. la yesteti`une nasra enfusihim vela hum minna yushabun
bel metta`na haulai veabaehum hatta tale `aleyhimu-l`umur. efela yeravne enna ne'ti-l'arda nenkusuha min atrafiha. efehumu-lgalibun
kul innema unzirukum bilvahy. vela yesme`u-ssummu-ddu`ae iza ma yunzerun
veleim messethum nefhatum min `azabi rabbike leyekulunne ya veylena inna kunna zalimin
veneda`u-lmevazine-lkista liyevmi-lkiyameti fela tuzlemu nefsun sey'a. vein kane miskale habbetim min hardelin eteyna biha. vekefa bina hasibin
velekad ateyna musa veharune-lfurkane vediyaev vezikral lilmuttekin
ellezine yahsevne rabbehum bilgaybi vehum mine-ssa`ati musfikun
vehaza zikrum mubarakun enzelnah. efeentum lehu munkirun
velekad ateyna ibrahime rusdehu min kablu vekunna bihi `alimin
iz kale liebihi vekavmihi ma hazihi-ttemasilu-lleti entum leha `akifun
kalu vecedna abaena leha `abidin
kale lekad kuntum entum veabaukum fi dalalim mubin
kalu eci'tena bilhakki em ente mine-lla`ibin
kale ber rabbukum rabbu-ssemavati vel'ardi-llezi fetarahunn. veena `ala zalikum mine-ssahidin
vetellahi leekidenne asnamekum ba`de en tuvellu mudbirin
fece`alehum cusesen illa kebiral lehum le`allehum ileyhi yerci`un
kalu men fe`ale haza bialihetina innehu lemine-zzalimin
kalu semi`na fetey yezkuruhum yukalu lehu ibrahim
kalu fe'tu bihi `ala a`yuni-nnasi le`allehum yeshedun
kalu eente fe`alte haza bialihetina ya ibrahim
kale bel fe`aleh. kebiruhum haza fes'eluhum in kanu yentikun
ferace`u ila enfusihim fekalu innekum entumu-zzalimun
summe nukisu `ala ruusihim. lekad `alimte ma haulai yentikun
kale efeta`budune min duni-llahi ma la yenfe`ukum sey'ev vela yedurrukum
uffil lekum velima ta`budune min duni-llah. efela ta`kilun
kalu harrikuhu vensuru alihetekum in kuntum fa`ilin
kulna ya naru kuni berdev veselamen `ala ibrahim
veeradu bihi keyden fece`alnahumu-l'ahserin
venecceynahu velutan ile-l'ardi-lleti barakna fiha lil`alemin
vevehebna lehu ishak. veya`kube nafileten. vekullen ce`alna salihin
vece`alnahum eimmetey yehdune biemrina veevhayna ileyhim fi`le-lhayrati veikame-ssalati veitae-zzekah. vekanu lena `abidin
velutan ateynahu hukmev ve`ilmev venecceynahu mine-lkaryeti-lleti kanet ta`melu-lhabais. innehum kanu kavme sev'in fasikin
veedhalnahu fi rahmetina. innehu mine-ssalihin
venuhan iz nada min kablu festecebna lehu fenecceynahu veehlehu mine-lkerbi-l`azim
venesarnahu mine-lkavmi-llezine kezzebu biayatina. innehum kanu kavme sev'in feagraknahum ecme`in
vedavude vesuleymane iz yahkumani fi-lharsi iz nefeset fihi ganemu-lkavm. vekunna lihukmihim sahidin
fefehhemnaha suleyman. vekullen ateyna hukmev ve`ilma. vesehharna me`a davude-lcibale yusebbihne vettayr. vekunna fa`ilin
ve`allemnahu san`ate lebusil lekum lituhsinekum mim be'sikum. fehel entum sakirun
velisuleymane-rriha `asifeten tecri biemrih ile-l'ardi-lleti barakna fiha. vekunna bikulli sey'in `alimin
vemine-sseyatini mey yegusune lehu veya`melune `amelen dune zalik. vekunna lehum hafizin
veeyyube iz nada rabbehu enni messeniye-ddurru veente erhamu-rrahimin
festecebna lehu fekesefna ma bihi min durriv veateynahu ehlehu vemislehum me`ahum rahmetem min `indina vezikra lil`abidin
veisma`ile veidrise veze-lkifl. kullum mine-ssabirin
veedhalnahum fi rahmetina. innehum mine-ssalihin
veze-nnuni iz zehebe mugadiben fezanne el len nakdira `aleyhi fenada fi-zzulumati el la ilahe illa ente subhanek. inni kuntu mine-zzalimin
festecebna lehu venecceynahu mine-lgamm. vekezalike nunci-lmu'minin
vezekeriyya iz nada rabbehu rabbi la tezerni ferdev veente hayru-lvarisin
festecebna leh. vevehebna lehu yahya veaslahna lehu zevceh. innehum kanu yusari`une fi-lhayrati veyed`unena ragabev veraheba. vekanu lena hasi`in
velleti ahsanet ferceha fenefahna fiha mir ruhina vece`alnaha vebneha ayetel lil`alemin
inne hazihi ummetukum ummetev vahideh. veena rabbukum fa`budun
vetekatta`u emrahum beynehum. kullun ileyna raci`un
femey ya`mel mine-ssalihati vehuve mu'minun fela kufrane lisa`yih. veinna lehu katibun
veharamun `ala karyetin ehleknaha ennehum la yerci`un
hatta iza futihat ye'cucu veme'cucu vehum min kulli hadebiy yensilun
vakterabe-lva`du-lhakku feiza hiye sahisatun ebsaru-llezine keferu. ya veylena kad kunna fi gafletim min haza bel kunna zalimin
innekum vema ta`budune min duni-llahi hasabu cehennem. entum leha varidun
lev kane haulai alihetem ma veraduha. vekullun fiha halidun
lehum fiha zefiruv vehum fiha la yesme`un
inne-llezine sebekat lehum minne-lhusna ulaike `anha mub`adun
la yesme`une hasiseha. vehum fi me-stehet enfusuhum halidun
la yahzunuhumu-lfeza`u-l'ekberu vetetelekkahumu-lmelaikeh. haza yevmukumu-llezi kuntum tu`adun
yevme natvi-ssemae ketayyi-ssicilli lilkutub. kema bede'na evvele halkin nu`iduh. va`den `aleyna. inna kunna fa`ilin
velekad ketebna fi-zzeburi mim ba`di-zzikri enne-l'arda yerisuha `ibadiye-ssalihun
inne fi haza lebelagal likavmin `abidin
vema erselnake illa rahmetel lil`alemin
kul innema yuha ileyye ennema ilahukum ilahuv vahid. fehel entum muslimun
fein tevellev fekul ehentukum `ala seva'. vein edri ekaribun em be`idum ma tu`adun
innehu ya`lemu-lcehra mine-lkavli veya`lemu ma tektumun
vein edri le`allehu fitnetul lekum vemeta`un ila hin
kale rabbi-hkum bilhakk. verabbune-rrahmanu-lmuste`anu `ala ma tesifun
ya eyyuhe-nnasu-tteku rabbekum. inne zelzelete-ssa`ati sey'un `azim
yevme teravneha tezhelu kullu murdi`atin `amma erda`at vetede`u kullu zati hamlin hamleha vetera-nnase sukara vema hum bisukara velakinne `azabe-llahi sedid
vemine-nnasi mey yucadilu fi-llahi bigayri `ilmiv veyettebi`u kulle seytanim merid
kutibe `aleyhi ennehu men tevellahu feennehu yudilluhu veyehdihi ila `azabi-sse`ir

ya eyyuhe-nnasu in kuntum fi raybim mine-lba`si feinna halaknakum min turabin summe min nutfetin summe min `alekatin summe mim mudgatim muhallekativ vegayri muhallekatil linubeyyine lekum. venukirru fi-l'erhami ma nesau ila ecelim musemmen summe nuhricukum tiflen summe liteblugu esuddekum. veminkum mey yuteveffa veminkum mey yuraddu ila erzeli-l`umuri likeyla ya`leme mim ba`di `ilmin sey'a. vetera-l'arda hamideten feiza enzelna `aleyhe-lmae-htezzet verabet veembetet min kulli zevcim behic
zalike bienne-llahe huve-lhakku veennehu yuhyi-lmevta veennehu `ala kulli sey'in kadir
veenne-ssa`ate atiyetul la raybe fiha veenne-llahe yeb`asu men fi-lkubur
vemine-nnasi mey yucadilu fi-llahi bigayri `ilmiv vela hudev vela kitabim munir
saniye `itfihi liyudille `an sebili-llah. lehu fi-ddunya hizyuv venuzikuhu yevme-lkiyameti `azabe-lharik
zalike bima kaddemet yedake veenne-llahe leyse bizallamil lil`abid
vemine-nnasi mey ya`budu-llahe `ala harf. fein esabehu hayrun-tmeenne bih. vein esabethu fitnetun-nkalebe `ala vechih. hasira-ddunya vel'ahirah. zalike huve-lhusranu-lmubin
yed`u min duni-llahi ma la yedurruhu vema la yenfe`uh. zalike huve-ddalalu-lbe`id
yed`u lemen darruhu akrabu min nef`ih. lebi'se-lmevla velebi'se-l`asir
inne-llahe yudhilu-llezine amenu ve`amilu-ssalihati cennatin tecri min tahtihe-l'enhar. inne-llahe yef`alu ma yurid
men kane yezunnu el ley yensurahu-llahu fi-ddunya vel'ahirati felyemdud bisebebin ile-ssemai summe liyakta` felyenzur hel yuzhibenne keyduhu ma yegiz
vekezalike enzelnahu ayatim beyyinativ veenne-llahe yehdi mey yurid
inne-llezine amenu vellezine hadu vessabi'ine vennesara velmecuse vellezine esraku. inne-llahe yefsilu beynehum yevme-lkiyameh. inne-llahe `ala kulli sey'in sehid

elem tera enne-llahe yescudu lehu men fi-ssemavati vemen fi-l'ardi vessemsu velkameru vennucumu velcibalu vesseceru veddevabbu vekesirum mine-nnas. vekesirun hakka `aleyhi-l`azab. vemey yuhini-llahu fema lehu mim mukrim. inne-llahe yef`alu ma yesa
hazani hasmani-htesamu fi rabbihim. fellezine keferu kutti`at lehum siyabum min narin. yusabbu min fevki ruusihimu-lhamim
yusheru bihi ma fi butunihim velculud
velehum mekami`u min hadid
kullema eradu ey yahrucu minha min gammin u`idu fiha vezuku `azabe-lharik
inne-llahe yudhilu-llezine amenu ve`amilu-ssalihati cennatin tecri min tahtihe-l'enharu yuhallevne fiha min esavira min zehebiv velu'lua. velibasuhum fiha harir
vehudu ile-ttayyibi mine-lkavl. vehudu ila sirati-lhamid
inne-llezine keferu veyesuddune `an sebili-llahi velmescidi-lharami-llezi ce`alnahu linnasi sevaeni-l`akifu fihi velbad. vemey yurid fihi biilhadim bizulmin nuzikhu min `azabin elim
veiz bevve'na liibrahime mekane-lbeyti el la tusrik bi sey'ev vetahhir beytiye littaifine velkaimine verrukke`i-ssucud
veezzin fi-nnasi bilhacci ye'tuke ricalev ve`ala kulli damiriy ye'tine min kulli feccin `amik
liyeshedu menafi`a lehum veyezkuru-sme-llahi fi eyyamim ma`lumatin `ala ma razekahum mim behimeti-l'en`am. fekulu minha veat`imu-lbaise-lfekir
summe liyakdu tefesehum velyufu nuzurahum velyettavvefu bilbeyti-l`atik
zalik. vemey yu`azzim hurumati-llahi fehuve hayrul lehu `inde rabbih. veuhillet lekumu-l'en`amu illa ma yutla `aleykum fectenibu-rricse mine-l'evsani vectenibu kavle-zzur
hunefae lillahi gayra musrikine bih. vemey yusrik billahi fekeennema harra mine-ssemai fetahtafuhu-ttayru ev tehvi bihi-rrihu fi mekanin sehik
zalik. vemey yu`azzim se`aira-llahi feinneha min takve-lkulub
lekum fiha menafi`u ila ecelim musemmen summe mehilluha ile-lbeyti-l`atik
velikulli ummetin ce`alna mensekel liyezkuru-sme-llahi `ala ma razekahum mim behimeti-l'en`am. feilahukum ilahuv vahidun felehu eslimu. vebessiri-lmuhbitin
ellezine iza zukira-llahu vecilet kulubuhum vessabirine `ala ma esabehum velmukimi-ssalati vemimma razaknahum yunfikun

velbudne ce`alnaha lekum min se`airi-llahi lekum fiha hayr. fezkuru-sme-llahi `aleyha savaff. feiza vecebet cunubuha fekulu minha veat`imu-lkani`a velmu`terr. kezalike sehharnaha lekum le`allekum teskurun
ley yenale-llahe luhumuha vela dimauha velakiy yenaluhu-ttakva minkum. kezalike sehharaha lekum litukebbiru-llahe `ala ma hedakum. vebessiri-lmuhsinin
inne-llahe yudafi`u `ani-llezine amenu. inne-llahe la yuhibbu kulle havvanin kefur
uzine lillezine yukatelune biennehum zulimu. veinne-llahe `ala nasrihim lekadir

ellezine uhricu min diyarihim bigayri hakkin illa ey yekulu rabbune-llah. velevla def`u-llahi-nnase ba`dahum biba`dil lehuddimet savami`u vebiye`uv vesalevatuv vemesacidu yuzkeru fihe-smu-llahi kesira. veleyensuranne-llahu mey yensuruh. inne-llahe lekaviyyun `aziz
ellezine im mekkennahum fi-l'ardi ekamu-ssalate veatevu-zzekate veemeru bilma`rufi venehev `ani-lmunker. velillahi `akibetu-l'umur
veiy yukezzibuke fekad kezzebet kablehum kavmu nuhiv ve`aduv vesemud
vekavmu ibrahime vekavmu lut
veashabu medyen. vekuzzibe musa feemleytu lilkafirine summe ehaztuhum. fekeyfe kane nekir
fekeeyyim min karyetin ehleknaha vehiye zalimetun fehiye haviyetun `ala `urusiha vebi'rim mu`attaletiv vekasrim mesid
efelem yesiru fi-l'ardi fetekune lehum kulubuy ya`kilune biha ev azanuy yesme`une biha. feinneha la ta`me-l'ebsaru velakin ta`me-lkulubu-lleti fi-ssudur
veyesta`ciluneke bil`azabi veley yuhlife-llahu va`deh. veinne yevmen `inde rabbike keelfi senetim mimma te`uddun
vekeeyyim min karyetin emleytu leha vehiye zalimetun summe ehaztuha. veileyye-lmesir
kul ya eyyuhe-nnasu innema ene lekum nezirum mubin
fellezine amenu ve`amilu-ssalihati lehum magfiratuv verizkun kerim
vellezine se`av fi ayatina mu`acizine ulaike ashabu-lcehim
vema erselna min kablike mir rasuliv vela nebiyyin illa iza temenna elka-sseytanu fi umniyyetih. feyensehu-llahu ma yulki-sseytanu summe yuhkimu-llahu ayatih. vellahu `alimun hakim
liyec`ale ma yulki-sseytanu fitnetel lillezine fi kulubihim meraduv velkasiyeti kulubuhum. veinne-zzalimine lefi sikakim be`id
veliya`leme-llezine utu-l`ilme ennehu-lhakku mir rabbike feyu'minu bihi fetuhbita lehu kulubuhum. veinne-llahe lehadi-llezine amenu ila siratim mustekim
vela yezalu-llezine keferu fi miryetim minhu hatta te'tiyehumu-ssa`atu bagteten ev ye'tiyehum `azabu yevmin `akim
elmulku yevmeizil lillah. yahkumu beynehum. fellezine amenu ve`amilu-ssalihati fi cennati-nne`im
vellezine keferu vekezzebu biayatina feulaike lehum `azabum muhin
vellezine haceru fi sebili-llahi summe kutilu ev matu leyerzukannehumu-llahu rizkan hasena. veinne-llahe lehuve hayru-rrazikin
leyudhilennehum mudhaley yerdavneh. veinne-llahe le`alimun halim
zalik. vemen `akabe bimisli ma `ukibe bihi summe bugiye `aleyhi leyensurannehu-llah. inne-llahe le`afuvvun gafur
zalike bienne-llahe yulicu-lleyle fi-nnehari veyulicu-nnehara fi-lleyli veenne-llahe semi`um besir
zalike bienne-llahe huve-lhakku veenne ma yed`une min dunihi huve-lbatilu veenne-llahe huve-l`aliyyu-lkebir
elem tera enne-llahe enzele mine-ssemai maa. fetusbihu-l'ardu muhdarrah. inne-llahe letifun habir
lehu ma fi-ssemavati vema fi-l'ard. veinne-llahe lehuve-lganiyyu-lhamid
elem tera enne-llahe sehhara lekum ma fi-l'ardi velfulke tecri fi-lbahri biemrih. veyumsiku-ssemae en teka`a `ale-l'ardi illa biiznih. inne-llahe binnasi leraufur rahim
vehuve-llezi ahyakum. summe yumitukum summe yuhyikum. inne-l'insane lekefur
likulli ummetin ce`alna menseken hum nasikuhu fela yunazi`anneke fi-l'emri ved`u ila rabbik. inneke le`ala hudem mustekim
vein cadeluke fekuli-llahu a`lemu bima ta`melun
allahu yahkumu beynekum yevme-lkiyameti fima kuntum fihi tahtelifun
elem ta`lem enne-llahe ya`lemu ma fi-ssemai vel'ard. inne zalike fi kitab. inne zalike `ale-llahi yesir
veya`budune min duni-llahi ma lem yunezzil bihi sultanev vema leyse lehum bihi `ilm. vema lizzalimine min nesir

veiza tutla `aleyhim ayatuna beyyinatin ta`rifu fi vucuhi-llezine keferu-lmunker. yekadune yestune billezine yetlune `aleyhim ayatina. kul efeunebbiukum biserrim min zalikum. ennar. ve`adehe-llahu-llezine keferu. vebi'se-lmesir
ya eyyuhe-nnasu duribe meselun festemi`u leh. inne-llezine ted`une min duni-llahi ley yahluku zubabev velevi-cteme`u leh. veiy yeslubhumu-zzubabu sey'el la yestenkizuhu minh. da`ufe-ttalibu velmatlub
ma kaderu-llahe hakka kadrih. inne-llahe lekaviyyun `aziz
allahu yastafi mine-lmelaiketi rusulev vemine-nnas. inne-llahe semi`um besir
ya`lemu ma beyne eydihim vema halfehum. veile-llahi turce`u-l'umur
ya eyyuhe-llezine amenu-rke`u vescudu va`budu rabbekum vef`alu-lhayra le`allekum tuflihun

vecahidu fi-llahi hakka cihadih. huve-ctebakum vema ce`ale `aleykum fi-ddini min harac. millete ebikum ibrahim. huve semmakumu-lmuslimine min kablu vefi haza liyekune-rrasulu sehiden `aleykum vetekunu suhedae `ale-nnas. feekimu-ssalate veatu-zzekate va`tesimu billah. huve mevlakum. feni`me-lmevla veni`me-nnesir
